channel.title: [PI] 100 Errors HELP! rep++
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/14914as.jpg[/img] Someone please help I have no idea what I did wrong.
I will rep++.
P.S: Sorry about the Hypercam 6 Snap I'm in a rush to get my server back online.

item.title: [PI] 100 Errors HELP! rep++
item.dc:creator: @Lord_Typhis Lord Typhis
item.description:
@Lord_Typhis wrote:

Wait, where exactly do I add the bracket? I tried all the way down at the bottom and I still get 100 errors.

EDIT: FIXED!

Thank you to everyone that helped, I’ll make sure to rep++ you all.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] 100 Errors HELP! rep++
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

Download Notepad ++ (google) then open up your last editted file, and click the [-] button on the side until you have a huge jump in the line, like from 299 to 9763. Add a bracket where needed.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @DivineSouls DivineSouls
item.description:

item.title: [PI] 100 Errors HELP! rep++
item.dc:creator: @Javafire Javafire
item.description:
@Javafire wrote:

[quote=“Lord Typhis, post:1, topic:375967”]
Someone please help I have no idea what I did wrong.

I will rep++.

P.S: Sorry about the Hypercam 6 Snap I’m in a rush to get my server back online.[/quote]
use the button prt scr on your keyboard then hold down both controll and c in paint.
you have a { or } missing or added in a place it doesn’t belong

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] 100 Errors HELP! rep++
item.dc:creator: @timmarus1 timmarus1
item.description:
@timmarus1 wrote:

You’re missing a bracket. There are 24 opening brackets and only 23 closing brackets. Try adding a bracket at the end of the code to see if it helps =]

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] 100 Errors HELP! rep++
item.dc:creator: @DivineSouls DivineSouls
item.description:
@DivineSouls wrote:

No? Still 100 errors? Hmm, no no, now that you repped me, I have to fix it lol.

EDIT: What part were you editing when this error came up?

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] 100 Errors HELP! rep++
item.dc:creator: @Lord_Typhis Lord Typhis
item.description:
@Lord_Typhis wrote:

[quote=“DivineSouls, post:9, topic:375967”]The problem I believe is at case 566:

You had:

case 566: if(c.grimPrize == 2) { sendNpcChat1("Thank you so much "+c.playerName+".", c.talkingNpc, "Santa"); c.nextChat = 567 break;

Change to:

case 566: if(c.grimPrize == 2) { sendNpcChat1("Thank you so much "+c.playerName+".", c.talkingNpc, "Santa"); } c.nextChat = 567; break;[/quote]

Nope =\ I’m repping you anyways for trying.-

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] 100 Errors HELP! rep++
item.dc:creator: @DivineSouls DivineSouls
item.description:
@DivineSouls wrote:

The problem I believe is at case 566:

You had:

case 566: if(c.grimPrize == 2) { sendNpcChat1("Thank you so much "+c.playerName+".", c.talkingNpc, "Santa"); c.nextChat = 567 break;

Change to:

case 566: if(c.grimPrize == 2) { sendNpcChat1("Thank you so much "+c.playerName+".", c.talkingNpc, "Santa"); } c.nextChat = 567; break;

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] 100 Errors HELP! rep++
item.dc:creator: @Lord_Typhis Lord Typhis
item.description:
@Lord_Typhis wrote:

[code]package server.model.players;

public class DialogueHandler {

private Client c;

public DialogueHandler(Client client) {
	this.c = client;
}

/**
 * Handles all talking
 * @param dialogue The dialogue you want to use
 * @param npcId The npc id that the chat will focus on during the chat
 */
public void sendDialogues(int dialogue, int npcId) {
	c.talkingNpc = npcId;
	switch(dialogue) {
	case 0:
		c.talkingNpc = -1;
		c.getPA().removeAllWindows();
		c.nextChat = 0;
		break;
	case 1:
		sendStatement("You found a hidden tunnel! Do you want to enter it?");
		c.dialogueAction = 1;
		c.nextChat = 2;
		break;
	case 2:
		sendOption2("Yea! I'm fearless!",  "No way! That looks scary!");
		c.dialogueAction = 1;
		c.nextChat = 0;
		break;
	case 3:
		sendNpcChat4("Hello!", "My name is Duradel and I am a master of the slayer skill.", "I can assign you a slayer task suitable to your combat level.", 
		"Would you like a slayer task?", c.talkingNpc, "Duradel");
		c.nextChat = 4;
	break;
	case 5:
		sendNpcChat4("Hello adventurer...", "My name is Kolodion, the master of this mage bank.", "Would you like to play a minigame in order ", 
					"to earn points towards recieving magic related prizes?", c.talkingNpc, "Kolodion");
		c.nextChat = 6;
	break;
	case 6:
		sendNpcChat4("The way the game works is as follows...", "You will be teleported to the wilderness,", 
		"You must kill mages to recieve points,","redeem points with the chamber guardian.", c.talkingNpc, "Kolodion");
		c.nextChat = 15;
	break;
	case 43:
		sendNpcChat1("Congratulations, you completed your task!", c.talkingNpc, "Duradel");
		c.nextChat = 44;
	break;
	case 44:
		sendOption2("Recieve another task.", "No thanks.");
		c.dialogueAction = 5;
	break;
	case 11:
		sendNpcChat4("Hello!", "My name is Duradel and I am a master of the slayer skill.", "I can assign you a slayer task suitable to your combat level.", 
		"Would you like a slayer task?", c.talkingNpc, "Duradel");
		c.nextChat = 12;
	break;
	case 12:
		sendOption2("Yes I would like a slayer task.", "No I would not like a slayer task.");
		c.dialogueAction = 5;
	break;
	case 13:
		sendNpcChat4("Hello!", "My name is Duradel and I am a master of the slayer skill.", "I see I have already assigned you a task to complete.", 
		"Would you like me to give you an easier task?", c.talkingNpc, "Duradel");
		c.nextChat = 14;
	break;
	case 14:
		sendOption2("Yes I would like an easier task.", "No I would like to keep my task.");
		c.dialogueAction = 6;
	break;

	case 15:
		sendOption2("Yes I would like to play", "No, sounds too dangerous for me.");
		c.dialogueAction = 7;
	break;
	case 16:
		sendOption2("I would like to reset my barrows brothers.", "I would like to fix all my barrows");
		c.dialogueAction = 8;
	break;
	case 17:
		sendOption5("Air", "Mind", "Water", "Earth", "More");
		c.dialogueAction = 10;
		c.dialogueId = 17;
		c.teleAction = -1;
	break;
	case 18:
		sendOption5("Fire", "Body", "Cosmic", "Astral", "More");
		c.dialogueAction = 11;
		c.dialogueId = 18;
		c.teleAction = -1;
	break;
	case 19:
		sendOption5("Nature", "Law", "Death", "Blood", "More");
		c.dialogueAction = 12;
		c.dialogueId = 19;
		c.teleAction = -1;
	break;
	case 20:
		sendNpcChat4("Hello there "+c.playerName+"!"," I have the ability to reset your combat stats for free!","But remember, this is irreversable!","What would you like me to do?", c.talkingNpc, "Town Crier");
		c.nextChat = 21;
	break;
	case 21:
		sendOption4("Reset Defence", "Reset Prayer", "Reset Attack", "Reset All Combat Stats");
		c.dialogueAction = 42;
	break;
	case 22:
		sendNpcChat2("Sorry "+c.playerName+"...","Only donators can reset attack.",c.talkingNpc, "Town Crier");
		c.nextChat = 0;
	break;
	case 23:
		sendNpcChat2("Congratulations!", "Your defence has been reset back to 1.",c.talkingNpc, "Town Crier");
		c.nextChat = 0;
	break;
	case 24:
		sendNpcChat2("Congratulations!", "Your attack has been reset back to 1.",c.talkingNpc, "Town Crier");
		c.nextChat = 0;
	break;
	case 25:
		sendNpcChat2("Congratulations!", "Your combat stats have been reset back to 1.",c.talkingNpc, "Town Crier");
		c.nextChat = 0;
	break;
	case 26:
		sendNpcChat2("Congratulations!","Your prayer have been reset back to 1.",c.talkingNpc, "Town Crier");
		c.nextChat = 0;
	break;
	case 29:
		sendNpcChat4("Hello there "+c.playerName+"!"," I have the ability to lock your EXP!","You are able to unlock afterwards too.","What would you like me to do?", c.talkingNpc, "Town Crier");
		c.nextChat = 30;
	break;
	case 30:
		sendOption2("Lock EXP", "Unlock EXP");
		c.dialogueAction = 100;
	break;
	case 31:
		if(c.lockedEXP == 1) {
		sendNpcChat1("Your EXP has been unlocked!",c.talkingNpc, "Town Crier");
	c.lockedEXP = 0;
	} else {
sendNpcChat1("Your EXP is already unlocked!",c.talkingNpc, "Town Crier");
}
		c.nextChat = 0;
	break;
	case 32:
	if(c.lockedEXP == 0) {
		sendNpcChat1("Your EXP has been locked!",c.talkingNpc, "Town Crier");
c.lockedEXP = 1;
	} else {
sendNpcChat1("Your EXP is already locked!",c.talkingNpc, "Town Crier");
}
		c.nextChat = 0;
	break;
	case 33:
		c.getPA().movePlayer(3094, 3106, 0);
		sendNpcChat3("Hello there "+c.playerName+"!","Welcome to Project Reality!","I'm going to teach you how to play!", c.talkingNpc, "Project Reality Guide");
		c.nextChat = 34;
	break;
	case 34:
		sendNpcChat2("Talk to this guy.","He will teach you the control system mechanics.", c.talkingNpc, "Project Reality Guide");
		c.nextChat = 0;
		c.getPA().movePlayer(3085, 3123, 0);
	break;
	case 35:
		sendNpcChat2("Hi, "+c.playerName+".","I'm going to teach you the Mechanics in the game!", c.talkingNpc, "Mechanics Guide");
		c.nextChat = 36;
	break;
	case 36:
		sendNpcChat3("The arrow keys let your character's view move around.","The mouse's job is to let you move around.","And for also selecting other characters or objects.", c.talkingNpc, "Mechanics Guide");
		c.nextChat = 37;
	break;
	case 37:
		sendNpcChat2("Well, thats all you need to know from me.","Nice meeting you.", c.talkingNpc, "Mechanics Guide");
		c.nextChat = 0;
		c.getPA().movePlayer(3121, 3121, 0);
	break;
	case 38:
		sendNpcChat1("Welcome. I'll be teaching you how to make money.", c.talkingNpc, "Financial advisor");
		c.nextChat = 39;
	break;
	case 39:
		sendNpcChat1("I'm not a killin' man myself, but I suggest three options.", c.talkingNpc, "Financial advisor");
		c.nextChat = 40;	
	break;
	case 40:
		sendNpcChat3("1: Merchanting. - Buying items low & selling high.","2: Monster Killing. - For monster drops.","3: Player Killing (Pking). - For good drops.", c.talkingNpc, "Financial advisor");
		c.nextChat = 450;
	break;
	case 450:
		c.getPA().movePlayer(3106, 9515, 0);
		c.nextChat = 0;
	break;
	case 410:
	c.getPA().movePlayer(3333, 3333, 0);
	c.nextChat = 42;
	break;
	case 42:
		sendNpcChat2("Greetings.. Err..","Uh.. What's your name adventurer?", c.talkingNpc, "Combat Instructor");
		c.nextChat = 430;
	break;
	case 430:
	sendPlayerChat1("My name is "+c.playerName+".");
		c.nextChat = 440;
	break;
	case 440:
		sendNpcChat2("I knew that.",""+c.playerName+"..", c.talkingNpc, "Combat Instructor");
		c.nextChat = 45;
	break;
	case 45:
		sendNpcChat3("You can go ahead and train on the rats all you like.","Talk to my 'Helper' over there","if you want to teleport out of here.", c.talkingNpc, "Combat Instructor");
		c.nextChat = 0;
	break;
	case 46:
		sendNpcChat2("As you can most likely see,","killing things brings up *hic* your combat EXP.",  c.talkingNpc, "Jimmy");
		c.nextChat = 47;
	break;
	case 47:
		sendNpcChat2("Oh, hi, Erm.. *hic* my name's Jimmy.","I'll go ahead and teleport you outta *hic* here.",  c.talkingNpc, "Jimmy");
		c.nextChat = 48;
	break;
	case 48:
		sendNpcChat3("Please, Make sure that you talked to the *hic*","Combat Instructor first,","if you haven't, click on him *hic* now.",  c.talkingNpc, "Jimmy");
		c.nextChat = 49;
	break;
	case 49:
		c.nextChat = 0;
		c.getPA().movePlayer(2009, 4439, 0);
	break;
	case 50:
		sendNpcChat3("I think you are ready to go to the mainland.","Type ::commands to get you started.","Have fun playing Project Reality!",  c.talkingNpc, "Master Chef");
		c.nextChat = 51;
	break;
	case 51:
	c.getPA().movePlayer(3096, 3503, 0);
		c.finishedTutorial = true;
		c.finishedTutorial = false;
		c.endTutorial();
		c.getPA().sendFrame99(0);
		c.nextChat = 0;
		break;
		case 41:
	sendNpcChat2("Prepare yourself.", "You must defeat TzTok-Jad to win!", 2618, "Fight Caves Guide");
	c.nextChat = 0;
		break;
	case 950:
	sendNpcChat1("Looking try some gambling?",c.talkingNpc, "Project Reality Gambler");
		c.nextChat = 951;
	break;
	case 951:
	sendOption2("Yes", "No");
		c.dialogueAction = 950;
	break;
	case 952:
	sendPlayerChat1("No thanks.");
		c.nextChat = 955;
	break;
	case 953:
	sendPlayerChat1("Sure, I'm up for taking a risk.");
		c.nextChat = 954;
	break;
	case 954:
	sendNpcChat4("It's a 50/50 chance to win.","Winning doubles your money.","Losing will make you lose your money.","Use the machine next to me to get started.",c.talkingNpc, "Project Reality Gambler");
		c.nextChat = 0;
	break;
	case 955:
	sendNpcChat1("Eh. Alright then.",c.talkingNpc, "Project Reality Gambler");
		c.nextChat = 0;
	break;
	case 956:
	sendOption5("Bet 5000GP", "Bet 25000gp","Bet 100000gp","Bet 250000gp","Bet 500000gp");
		c.dialogueAction = 956;
	break;
	case 957:
	c.getPA().sendFrame126("Gamble "+c.betAmount+"?", 2460);
	sendOption2("Gamble "+c.betAmount+"gp", "Chicken Out!");
		c.dialogueAction = 957;
	break;
	case 958:
	sendNpcChat1("You need more coins to bet "+c.betAmount+"gp!",c.talkingNpc, "Project Reality Gambler");
		c.nextChat = 0;
	break;
	case 959:
	sendNpcChat2("Congratulations..","You win your "+c.betAmount+"gp bet!",c.talkingNpc, "Project Reality Gambler");
		c.nextChat = 0;
	break;
	case 960:
	sendNpcChat2("Unlucky..","You lose your "+c.betAmount+"gp bet.",c.talkingNpc, "Project Reality Gambler");
		c.nextChat = 0;
	break;
	case 1337:
		sendOption2("PK'er Scoreboard", "Skiller Scoreboard");
		c.dialogueAction = 1337;
	break;
	case 420:
		sendNpcChat2("Hello there "+c.playerName+".","Glorious day to be out walking isn't it?", c.talkingNpc, "Party Pete");
		c.nextChat = 421;
	break;
	case 421:
		sendPlayerChat2("What are you doing out here Party Pete?","Arn't you supposed to be at the Party Room?");
		c.nextChat = 422;
	break;
	case 422:
		sendNpcChat2("Well, they gave me a new job.","I now teleport players to the Donator's Island.", c.talkingNpc, "Party Pete");
		c.nextChat = 423;
	break;
	case 423:
		sendPlayerChat2("Whoah.","Can I go to the Donator's Island?");
		c.nextChat = 424;
	break;
	case 424:
		sendNpcChat2("Sure.","Have fun at the Donator's Island "+c.playerName+"!", c.talkingNpc, "Party Pete");
		c.nextChat = 0;
		c.getPA().movePlayer(2607, 4773, 0);
	break;
	case 550:
		sendNpcChat2("Elo der sunny boy.","Hows the donat'er eyeland workin' for ya?", c.talkingNpc, "Grandpa Jack");
		c.nextChat = 551;
	break;
	case 551:
	sendPlayerChat2("Hello there, I think the island is great!","What are you doing on the island?");
		c.nextChat = 552;
	break;
	case 552:
		sendNpcChat2("Y'know sunny boy, I'm just an old man.","Don't be-a listenin' to old folk, got it?", c.talkingNpc, "Grandpa Jack");
		c.nextChat = 553;
	break;
	case 553:
	sendPlayerChat2("Whoah, Calm down old man.","Don't go break a hip.");
		c.nextChat = 554;
	break;
	case 554:
		sendNpcChat2("Don't act like dat to old men.","Or I'll whip yo'... so hard... ", c.talkingNpc, "Grandpa Jack");
		c.nextChat = 555;
	break;
	case 555:
		sendNpcChat1("....Snore....", c.talkingNpc, "Grandpa Jack");
		c.nextChat = 556;
	break;
	case 556:
	sendPlayerChat1("O.O");
		c.nextChat = 0;
	break;
	case 560:
		sendNpcChat2("Oh God.. Oh god..","Oh.. god!  Noo!", c.talkingNpc, "Santa");
		c.nextChat = 561;
	break;
	case 561:
		sendPlayerChat1("What's wrong Santa?!");
		c.nextChat = 562;
	break;
	case 562:
	sendNpcChat2(""+c.playerName+"...","Please help me...", c.talkingNpc, "Santa");
		c.nextChat = 563;
	break;
	case 563:
		sendPlayerChat2("What the.. What happened to you?","You look terrible.");
		c.nextChat = 564;
	break;
	case 564:
	sendNpcChat3("The monster..","It came out of nowhere, it took..","EVERYTHING.", c.talkingNpc, "Santa");
		c.nextChat = 565;
	break;
	case 565:
		sendNpcChat2("Please, go destroy the monster","GO SAVE CHRISTMAS!", c.talkingNpc, "Santa");
		c.nextChat = 0;
		c.grimPrize = 1;
		c.sendMessage("You should go into the portal when you are ready to fight the beast.");
	break;
	case 566:
	if(c.grimPrize == 2) {
	sendNpcChat1("Thank you so much "+c.playerName+".", c.talkingNpc, "Santa");
		c.nextChat = 567;
	break;
	case 567:
		sendNpcChat2("Would you like a","free present for all of your efforts?", c.talkingNpc, "Santa");
		c.nextChat = 568;
	break;
	case 568:
	sendPlayerChat1("Sure!");
		c.nextChat = 569;
	break;
	case 569:
		sendNpcChat2("Here you go, these should keep you very warm.","Merry Christmas!", c.talkingNpc, "Santa");
		c.grimPrize = 3;
		c.getItems().addItem(6858, 1);
		c.getItems().addItem(6859, 1);
		c.nextChat = 570;
	break;
	case 570:
	sendPlayerChat1("Merry Christmas to you too, Santa.");
		c.nextChat = 0;
	break;
	case 700:
	sendNpcChat2("Hello, Adventurer!","Did you know it's almost Christmas?", c.talkingNpc, "Lumbridge Guide");
		c.nextChat = 701;
	break;
	case 701:
	sendOption2("Yes", "Go away");
		c.dialogueAction = 702;
	break;
	case 703:
	sendPlayerChat1("Cool.");
		c.nextChat = 0;
	break;
	case 704:
	sendPlayerChat1("GO AWAY!");
		c.nextChat = 0;

}
}

/*
 * Information Box
 */

public void sendStartInfo(String text, String text1, String text2, String text3, String title) {
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(title, 6180);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(text, 6181);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(text1, 6182);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(text2, 6183);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(text3, 6184);
	c.getPA().sendFrame164(6179);
}

/*
 * Options
 */

private void sendOption(String s, String s1) {
	c.getPA().sendFrame126("Select an Option", 2470);
 	c.getPA().sendFrame126(s, 2471);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(s1, 2472);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126("Click here to continue", 2473);
	c.getPA().sendFrame164(13758);
}	

private void sendOption2(String s, String s1) {
	c.getPA().sendFrame126("Select an Option", 2460);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(s, 2461);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(s1, 2462);
	c.getPA().sendFrame164(2459);
}

private void sendOption3(String s, String s1, String s2) {
	c.getPA().sendFrame126("Select an Option", 2460);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(s, 2461);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(s1, 2462);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(s2, 2462);
	c.getPA().sendFrame164(2459);
}

public void sendOption4(String s, String s1, String s2, String s3) {
	c.getPA().sendFrame126("Select an Option", 2481);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(s, 2482);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(s1, 2483);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(s2, 2484);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(s3, 2485);
	c.getPA().sendFrame164(2480);
}

public void sendOption5(String s, String s1, String s2, String s3, String s4) {
	c.getPA().sendFrame126("Select an Option", 2493);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(s, 2494);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(s1, 2495);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(s2, 2496);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(s3, 2497);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(s4, 2498);
	c.getPA().sendFrame164(2492);
}

/*
 * Statements
 */

private void sendStatement(String s) { // 1 line click here to continue chat box interface
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(s, 357);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126("Click here to continue", 358);
	c.getPA().sendFrame164(356);
}

/*
 * Npc Chatting
 */

public void sendNpcChat1(String s, int ChatNpc, String name) {
	c.getPA().sendFrame200(4883, 591);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(name, 4884);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(s, 4885);
	c.getPA().sendFrame75(ChatNpc, 4883);
	c.getPA().sendFrame164(4882);
}

private void sendNpcChat2(String s, String s1, int ChatNpc, String name) {
	c.getPA().sendFrame200(4888, 591);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(name, 4889);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(s, 4890);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(s1, 4891);
	c.getPA().sendFrame75(ChatNpc, 4888);
	c.getPA().sendFrame164(4887);
}

private void sendNpcChat3(String s, String s1, String s2, int ChatNpc, String name) {
	c.getPA().sendFrame200(4894, 591);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(name, 4895);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(s, 4896);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(s1, 4897);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(s2, 4898);
	c.getPA().sendFrame75(ChatNpc, 4894);
	c.getPA().sendFrame164(4893);
}


private void sendNpcChat4(String s, String s1, String s2, String s3, int ChatNpc, String name) {
	c.getPA().sendFrame200(4901, 591);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(name, 4902);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(s, 4903);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(s1, 4904);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(s2, 4905);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(s3, 4906);
	c.getPA().sendFrame75(ChatNpc, 4901);
	c.getPA().sendFrame164(4900);
}

/*
 * Player Chating Back
 */

private void sendPlayerChat1(String s) {
	c.getPA().sendFrame200(969, 591);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(c.playerName, 970);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(s, 971);
	c.getPA().sendFrame185(969);
	c.getPA().sendFrame164(968);
}

private void sendPlayerChat2(String s, String s1) {
	c.getPA().sendFrame200(974, 591);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(c.playerName, 975);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(s, 976);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(s1, 977);
	c.getPA().sendFrame185(974);
	c.getPA().sendFrame164(973);
}

private void sendPlayerChat3(String s, String s1, String s2) {
	c.getPA().sendFrame200(980, 591);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(c.playerName, 981);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(s, 982);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(s1, 983);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(s2, 984);
	c.getPA().sendFrame185(980);
	c.getPA().sendFrame164(979);
}

private void sendPlayerChat4(String s, String s1, String s2, String s3) {
	c.getPA().sendFrame200(987, 591);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(c.playerName, 988);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(s, 989);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(s1, 990);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(s2, 991);
	c.getPA().sendFrame126(s3, 992);
	c.getPA().sendFrame185(987);
	c.getPA().sendFrame164(986);
}

}[/code]
